name: social-soloboss-automation
description: Social SoloBoss Automation - Social media automation platform with Blogger and SoloBoss AI integration

scripts.test:unit: npm run test --workspace=@sma/backend -- --selectProjects unit && npm run test --workspace=@sma/frontend && npm run test --workspace=@sma/shared
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e --workspace=@sma/backend && npm run test:e2e --workspace=@sma/frontend
scripts.docs:api: npm run build --workspace=@sma/backend && node -e "const { generateSwaggerSpec } = require('./packages/backend/dist/docs/swagger.js'); const fs = require('fs'); const spec = generateSwaggerSpec(); fs.writeFileSync('docs/api-spec.json', JSON.stringify(spec, null, 2));"
